Headline

Everything I Learned About Modern Investing

Brief

The barrier to investing is lower than ever before...so don't be a retard.

Takeaways

  • Investing is viewed as a dark art but it's actually easier than ever before.
  • Any investment targeting more than 8% in a year should just be considered gambling.
  • Don't fall for the crypto hype.
